# AstroExpansion v1.0.24

## What's Changed
- Implement storage search, favorites, and structure preview (knoxhack)

## Installation
1. Install Minecraft Forge 1.20.1 (version 47.2.0 or newer)
2. Download the JAR file from the assets below
3. Place it in your `.minecraft/mods` folder

## Requirements
- Minecraft 1.20.1
- Forge 47.2.0+
- Java 17+
